thread.title: Dollar Reverses Losses

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Reverses Losses
text:
The dollar reversed losses Thursday, as investors bought the U.S. currency amid a fresh drop in equities.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently up less than 0.1% at 84.25, rebounding from 84.07 earlier in the session.
U.S. stocks dropped Thursday, as investors prepared...
